title: School holidays
body: A collage I'm working on that is an accurate representation of the school holidays experience on OCE. These are just taken from my last 10 games and I'll keep adding more to it I'm sure as the hell that is school holidays continues

replies.body: Ya happens to me too, I just stopped playing ranked entirely. If you want a good game queue up at 3am NZT or 1am AUT when the holidays aren't on. Then u get better players.
Why do you take aery on ziggs... normal players go commet
I was changing runes and ran out of time, I run comet too. The difference between comet and aery isn't going to lose a lane though
The match making is legitimately broken. Every game I'm getting genuine new level 5-10 players on my side and on the other team level 40+ B1-S3s
